MemoryInfobox.description: 'With all the might and cunning she'd become known for, Kassandra dealt with Amorges's forces in Messenia and needed to reconvene with her ally, Darius.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Bloodline'

General_Description: '''The Trap Is Set''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met with Darius in [[Aipeia]] after which she received a message from the Order, brought by [[Pebble]].
Section_Dialogue:
Having finished her traditional disruptions of Order activities, Kassandra returned to Darius' hideout in Aipeia to discuss the next phase of their plan.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We've weakened the Order. Now what?''
*'''Darius:''' ''Now we move on to the next part of the plan.''
Darius led her towards the exit.
*'''Darius:''' ''We'll take the Order down under the cover of night. I have an Athenian general to speak with. I'll return to the lumberyard to prepare our next steps.''
Darius left, and Kassandra turned to see a child enter.

<tabber>
|-|Children stayed in 'Command and Control'=
[[File:ACOD_The_Trap_Is_Set_3.png|thumb|250px|Pebble handing the note to Kassandra]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''[[Pebble]]? It's not safe here.''
*'''Pebble:''' ''I was asked to pass this to you, Eaglethunder. By a man in a mask.''
Kassandra accepted the note.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Pebble, you have to go. And don't speak to any more masked man [sic], understand? It's not safe.''
*'''Pebble:''' ''Yes, Eaglethunder.''
Pebble walked off.
|-|Children sent away=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What are you doing here, child?''
*'''Helot Child:''' ''I have a note for you, Eagle Bearer. A man in a mask told me to take it to you.''
Kassandra accepted the note and the child walked off.
</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Man with a mask...''
She unfurled the note.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''"Meet me at the graves in Aipeia." What is the Order up to?''
